reviews.text: Well, sometimes five stars are not enough. This is the case. From super-friendly staff to clean and unusual hotel itself (in a good way) to amazing food on grill, turtles and pool it was overall fantastic experience. Thank you!
One of the highlights of this hotel is the lovely courtyard with a pool, providing shade a spot to cool down on a hot day. The rooms are quiet and comfortable, and the breakfast buffet extensive.

My girlfriend and I were excited to stay at Bujtina e Glejit, expecting it to be one of the highlights of our trip through Albania. The hotel appeared promising, especially with its advertised restaurant serving grilled meats and a nice swimming pool in the middle of the hotel‚Äîa perfect setup for our son, who was looking forward to a swim after a long day of travel in 40¬∞C heat.

We arrived at the hotel around 4:30 PM and immediately asked about the pool hours, being told it closed at 8:00 PM. Feeling reassured, we headed to the restaurant for a meal, only to discover it has been closed  for the last two months due to a lack of customers. This was quite disappointing as the restaurant was one of the main reasons we chose this hotel.

After finding somewhere else to eat, we returned to the hotel at 7:30 PM, expecting to enjoy a quick dip in the pool. However, we were informed that the pool was already closed. Despite our earlier confirmation that it would be open until 8:00 PM, the staff explained that if the pool is empty, they close it early, which was not mentioned before.

My girlfriend argued our case, explaining how much our son had been looking forward to swimming, especially after such a hot day. Unfortunately, the staff were not flexible and didn't allow us to use the pool, which was a major letdown.

The rooms were cozy, but the misleading information about the restaurant and the pool significantly marred our experience. Given this, I'm afraid we won't be returning to Bujtina e Glejit. I hope the management addresses these issues and updates their website to reflect the current situation accurately.
